sanger.argml.graph.model
Class Haplotype

java.lang.Object
  sanger.argml.graph.model.Haplotype

public class Haplotype
extends java.lang.Object

A biallelic haplotype. The missing set indicates which values are in fact unknown and should be ignored when reading the marker values set.

Author:
lg8

Constructor Detail

Haplotype

protected Haplotype(NaturalSet markers,
                    NaturalSet missing)
Construct a new haplotype with the supplied markers and missing values.

Parameters:
markers - Biallelic marker values.
missing - Positions where the value is unknown.
Method Detail

decode

public static Haplotype decode(java.lang.String line,
                               NaturalDomain domain)
Decode a binary string into a haplotype. line should match the [01M]* expression.

Parameters:
line - String to decode
domain - Domain determining the dimensions of the haplotype.
Returns:
A new haplotypes.

project

public static Haplotype project(NaturalDomain domain,
                                Haplotype haplotype)
                         throws NaturalSetException
Project the haplotype onto a different domain. For more details about projecting a set see the domain project method.

Parameters:
domain - Domain to prject the haplotype to.
haplotype - Haplotype to project.
Returns:
A new haplotype in domain coordinates.
Throws:
NaturalSetException - if the haplotype is not defined over the same space as domain.
